uri=#{menu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and TO_CHAR(crt_time, 'yyyy-MM-dd') between to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') AND to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd')
and TO_CHAR(crt_time, 'yyyy-MM-dd') between to_char((select trunc(sysdate, 'd') + 1 from dual),'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd')
and TO_CHAR(crt_time, 'yyyy-MM-dd') between to_char((select trunc(sysdate, 'mm') from dual),'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd')

select count(*) from admin_gatelog
where crt_time between to_date(to_char((select TRUNC(SYSDATE - 1) from dual),'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyy-MM-dd') and to_date(to_char(SYSDATE,'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyy-MM-dd')
where crt_time between to_date(to_char((select trunc(sysdate, 'yy') from dual),'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyy-MM-dd') and to_date(to_char(SYSDATE,'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyy-MM-dd')
where crt_time between to_date(to_char((select TRUNC(SYSDATE,'YYYY')-INTERVAL '1' YEAR from dual),'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyy-MM-dd') and to_date(to_char((select trunc(sysdate -1, 'yyyy') from dual),'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyy-MM-dd')
where crt_time between to_date(to_char((select TRUNC(SYSDATE - 2) from dual),'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyy-MM-dd') and to_date(to_char((select TRUNC(SYSDATE - 1) from dual),'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyy-MM-dd')
